article.headline: Radford 75, Gardner-Webb 45
article.story: RADFORD, Va. -- Art Parakhouski scored 26 points and grabbed 16 rebounds to help Radford defeat Gardner-Webb 75-45 on Monday night. Parakhouski, who tallied his 10th double-double of the season, had his third in the first half with 18 points and 11 rebounds to help the Highlanders (8-5, 4-0 Big South Conference) lead 36-22 at halftime. Lazar Trifunovic, who finished with 16 points, scored 12 in the first half to team with Parakhouski for 30 of Radford's 36 first-half points. The Runnin' Bulldogs (3-10, 0-3) scored the first four points of the second half to cut the score to 36-26 on C.J. Hailey's jumper with 18:54 left. But the Highlanders answered with a 20-1 run, capped by Parakhouski's layup for a 58-29 lead with 11:38 remaining. Jonathan Moore scored 10 points for the Bulldogs, who lost their 10th in a row. Gardner-Webb shot 10 percent from 3-point range (2 of 20).

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
